title: 135 - It's Poop Again
description: On today's show, Tony and Nick are both out of town on vacation, so the boys just let it rip and dive into a bracket that circulated over the weekend about the best fast food restaurants you'll find with a surprising champion being crowned. They also discuss what Mitt did over the weekend, finally cleaning The Pub, Zito potentially being interested in John Wayne Gacy's house in Illinois, some new faces spot by, Foxy sticks around for a bit, and Digs checks in from a beach all boozed up on his birthday. Don't forget to subscribe to the Youtube channel and send your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram, we appreciate you guys for listening, we'll see you Friday.
dc:creator: The Pod
